agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: State Affairs TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Wednesday, April 3, 2019 PLACE: E2.014 CHAIR: Rep. Dade Phelan HB 2100 Cain Relating to the protection of expressive activities at state facilities, including institutions of higher education; creating a civil action. HB 2286 Oliverson | et al. Relating to the criminal consequences of engaging in certain conduct with respect to certain firearm accessories and prohibiting the enforcement of certain federal laws related to certain firearm accessories. HB 2865 Parker Relating to procedures for imposing certain administrative penalties or disgorgement orders by the Public Utility Commission of Texas. HB 4306 Biedermann | et al. Relating to the creation of a fund to pay for border security enhancement projects; allocating the earnings on the balance of that fund and reimbursement of related expenditures. HB 4449 Holland | et al. Relating to the applicability of certain electric energy storage equipment requirements to municipally owned utilities and electric cooperatives. HB 4451 Pacheco | et al. Relating to state recognition of the Tap Pilam Coahuiltecan Nation. ***ALL TESTIMONY WILL BE LIMITED TO 3 MINUTES*** NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
